Pegasus Airlines  is established in 1990. It is a Turkish low-cost airline headquartered in the Kurtkoy area of Pendik, Istanbul with bases at several Turkish airports.

 

 

 

Pegasus Airlines in Istanbul, Turkey Contact Address, Phone, Email, Working hours and Website

Address: Aeropark Yenişehir Mah. Ottoman Boulevard
No:11/A 34912 – Kurtkoy/Istanbul Turkey

Phone number:  0888 228 12 12, +90 216 560 70 00

FAX: +90 216 560 70 93

Email ID: info@flypgs.com

Opening hours: NA

Pegasus Airlines Official website: https://www.flypgs.com/en

Pegasus Airlines Online Check-in: https://www.flypgs.com/en/useful-info/info-about-flights/check-in

Note: Online check-in closes 60 minutes before the flight departure.

Check Pegasus Airlines schedule here: https://www.flypgs.com/en/write-to-us/time-and-schedule-changes

Check Pegasus Airlines flight status here: https://www.flypgs.com/en/manage-my-booking

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Pegasus Airlines

Total fleet: 92

  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A320neo
  • Airbus A321neo
  • Boeing 737-800

Pegasus Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Pegasus Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Pegasus Airlines

Traveling while Pregnant in Pegasus Airlines

  • Pegasus Airlines, flying until the 36th week of pregnancy, would not cause any harm in single pregnancies.
  • In multiple pregnancies, the duration is restricted to 32 weeks.

For more details: https://www.flypgs.com/en/travel-glossary/pregnant-passenger

Traveling with Pets in Pegasus Airlines

  • Pegasus only allows the carriage of cats, dogs and birds on domestic Scheduled Flights and cats and dogs on international Scheduled Flights.

For more details: https://www.flypgs.com/en/write-to-us/pets#sf-2

Queries handled by Pegasus Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Pegasus BolBol
